Title: Amirdrassil, the Dream's Hope: Up in Smoke
Description: Smolderon appears to be aiding Fyrakk's assault on the Dream! If you collect some fragments of Emberscar, his legendary weapon, we may be able to attune with his energy and assault his throne directly.
ObjectivesText: Collect 3 Fragments of Emberscar from Smolderon within Amirdrassil, the Dream's Hope on Heroic difficulty.
CompletionText: The energy found within these fragments will allow us to quickly access the Throne of the Firelord.
RewardText: These should grant us access to Smolderon's throne more easily.
